title: Donald Trump's Charlottesville Press Conference: Breaking Crazy | Bryan Fogel
description:
Seth breaks down the crazy that came out of President Trump's most recent press conference, where he seemed to side with white supremacists in the wake of the events in Charlottesville. (0:20)
Then, filmmaker Bryan Fogel explains how he unintentionally documented the Russian Olympic doping scandal for his film Icarus and helped the mastermind escape to the U.S. (2:30)
After that, Fogel takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G from Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly. (8:16)
